intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) provides comprehensive information regarding the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) CLCplus Backbone 2023 product, a high-resolution (10m) land cover map of Europe derived from Sentinel-2 imagery. It details the product's characteristics, including its lineage, nomenclature based on EAGLE Land Cover Components, technical specifications, and auxiliary layers (Data Score, Confidence, and Post-processing). The manual also outlines the product's application areas, methodology, terms of use, and provides guidance for effective utilisation and interpretation of the data for various environmental monitoring, research, and policy support activities.
